mapper.sql: woi.id,wm_out_coded, woi.certificate_coded, woi.goods_id, woi.wm_out_number, woi.invoices_status, woi.wm_out_date, woi.storekeeper, woi.storekeeper_id, woi.synthesis_keeper, woi.synthesis_keeper_id, woi.receiver, woi.receiver_id, woi.create_time, woi.update_by, woi.update_time, woi.create_by, woi.out_type
wot.wm_out_id, wot.client, wot.cause, wot.certificate_coded_assaciation, wot.wm_out_reason, wot.cigarette_quality, wot.unit_coded
mapper.delete:
delete from wm_out_temporary where wm_out_id in
#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wm_out_info (wm_out_coded, certificate_coded, goods_id, wm_out_number, invoices_status, wm_out_date, storekeeper, storekeeper_id, synthesis_keeper, synthesis_keeper_id, receiver, receiver_id, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by, out_type) values (#{info.wmOutCoded}, #{info.certificateCoded}, #{info.goodsId}, #{info.wmOutNumber}, #{info.invoicesStatus}, #{info.wmOutDate}, #{info.storekeeper}, #{info.storekeeperId}, #{info.synthesisKeeper}, #{info.synthesisKeeperId}, #{info.receiver}, #{info.receiverId}, #{info.createTime}, #{info.updateBy}, #{info.updateTime}, #{info.createBy}, #{info.outType})
mapper.select: select ,, goods.goods_name,goods.goods_specification from wm_out_temporary wot left join wm_out_info woi on wot.wm_out_id=woi.id left join bs_goods_info goods on goods.id = woi.goods_id left join bs_dealingsunit_info unit on unit.unit_coded=wot.unit_coded where woi.out_type= 2 and woi.id=#{id} and unit.unit_enabled=0
